verses.text: \w He|strong="H0376"\w*, that being often \w reproved|strong="H8433"\w* \w hardeneth|strong="H7185"\w* \add his\add* \w neck|strong="H6203"\w*, shall \w suddenly|strong="H6621"\w* be \w destroyed|strong="H7665"\w*, and that without \w remedy|strong="H4832"\w*.\f + \fr 29.1 \ft He…: Heb. A man of reproofs\f*

When the \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w* are in \w authority|strong="H7235"\w*, the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w rejoice|strong="H8055"\w*: but when the \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* beareth \w rule|strong="H4910"\w*, the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w mourn|strong="H0584"\w*. \f + \fr 29.2 \ft in…: or, increased\f*

\w Whoso|strong="H0376"\w* \w loveth|strong="H0157"\w* \w wisdom|strong="H2451"\w* \w rejoiceth|strong="H8055"\w* his \w father|strong="H0001"\w*: but he that keepeth \w company|strong="H7462"\w* with \w harlots|strong="H2181"\w* \w spendeth|strong="H0006"\w* \add his\add* \w substance|strong="H1952"\w*.

The \w king|strong="H4428"\w* by \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w* \w establisheth|strong="H5975"\w* the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*: but \w he|strong="H0376"\w* that receiveth \w gifts|strong="H8641"\w* \w overthroweth|strong="H2040"\w* it.\f + \fr 29.4 \ft he…: Heb. a man of oblations\f*
A \w man|strong="H1397"\w* that \w flattereth|strong="H2505"\w* his \w neighbour|strong="H7453"\w* \w spreadeth|strong="H6566"\w* a \w net|strong="H7568"\w* for his \w feet|strong="H6471"\w*.

In the \w transgression|strong="H6588"\w* of an \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \add there is\add* a \w snare|strong="H4170"\w*: but the \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w* doth \w sing|strong="H7442"\w* and \w rejoice|strong="H8056"\w*.

The \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w* \w considereth|strong="H3045"\w* the \w cause|strong="H1779"\w* of the \w poor|strong="H1800"\w*: \add but\add* the \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* \w regardeth|strong="H0995"\w* not to \w know|strong="H1847"\w* \add it\add*.

\w Scornful|strong="H3944"\w* \w men|strong="H0582"\w* \w bring|strong="H6315"\w* a \w city|strong="H7151"\w* into a \w snare|strong="H6315"\w*: but \w wise|strong="H2450"\w* \add men\add* turn \w away|strong="H7725"\w* \w wrath|strong="H0639"\w*.\f + \fr 29.8 \ft bring…: or, set a city on fire\f*

\add If\add* a \w wise|strong="H2450"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w contendeth|strong="H8199"\w* with a \w foolish|strong="H0191"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w*, whether he \w rage|strong="H7264"\w* or \w laugh|strong="H7832"\w*, \add there is\add* no \w rest|strong="H5183"\w*.

The \w bloodthirsty|strong="H0582"\w* \w hate|strong="H8130"\w* the \w upright|strong="H8535"\w*: but the \w just|strong="H3477"\w* \w seek|strong="H1245"\w* his \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*.\f + \fr 29.10 \ft The bloodthirsty: Heb. Men of blood\f*

A \w fool|strong="H3684"\w* \w uttereth|strong="H3318"\w* all his \w mind|strong="H7307"\w*: but a \w wise|strong="H2450"\w* \add man\add* \w keepeth|strong="H7623"\w* it in till \w afterwards|strong="H0268"\w*.
If a \w ruler|strong="H4910"\w* \w hearken|strong="H7181"\w* to \w lies|strong="H1697"\w*, all his \w servants|strong="H8334"\w* \add are\add* \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w*.

The \w poor|strong="H7326"\w* and the \w deceitful|strong="H8501"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* meet \w together|strong="H6298"\w*: the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w lighteneth|strong="H0215"\w* \w both|strong="H8147"\w* their \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*.\f + \fr 29.13 \ft the deceitful…: or, the usurer\f*

The \w king|strong="H4428"\w* that \w faithfully|strong="H0571"\w* \w judgeth|strong="H8199"\w* the \w poor|strong="H1800"\w*, his \w throne|strong="H3678"\w* shall be \w established|strong="H3559"\w* for \w ever|strong="H5703"\w*.

The \w rod|strong="H7626"\w* and \w reproof|strong="H8433"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w wisdom|strong="H2451"\w*: but a \w child|strong="H5288"\w* \w left|strong="H7971"\w* \add to himself\add* bringeth his \w mother|strong="H0517"\w* to \w shame|strong="H0954"\w*.

When the \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* are \w multiplied|strong="H7235"\w*, \w transgression|strong="H6588"\w* \w increaseth|strong="H7235"\w*: but the \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w* shall \w see|strong="H7200"\w* their \w fall|strong="H4658"\w*.

\w Correct|strong="H3256"\w* thy \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, and he shall give thee \w rest|strong="H5117"\w*; yea, he shall \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w delight|strong="H4574"\w* unto thy \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*.

Where \add there is\add* no \w vision|strong="H2377"\w*, the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w perish|strong="H6544"\w*: but he that \w keepeth|strong="H8104"\w* the \w law|strong="H8451"\w*, \w happy|strong="H0835"\w* \add is\add* he.\f + \fr 29.18 \ft perish: or, is made naked\f*
A \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* will not be \w corrected|strong="H3256"\w* by \w words|strong="H1697"\w*: for though he \w understand|strong="H0995"\w* he will not \w answer|strong="H4617"\w*.

\w Seest|strong="H2372"\w* thou a \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \add that is\add* \w hasty|strong="H0213"\w* in his \w words|strong="H1697"\w*? \add there is\add* more \w hope|strong="H8615"\w* of a \w fool|strong="H3684"\w* than of him.\f + \fr 29.20 \ft words: or, matters?\f*

He that delicately bringeth \w up|strong="H6445"\w* his \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* from a \w child|strong="H5290"\w* shall have him become \add his\add* \w son|strong="H4497"\w* at the \w length|strong="H0319"\w*.

An \w angry|strong="H0639"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* stirreth \w up|strong="H1624"\w* \w strife|strong="H4066"\w*, and a \w furious|strong="H2534"\w* \w man|strong="H1167"\w* aboundeth \w in|strong="H7227"\w* \w transgression|strong="H6588"\w*.

A \w man’s|strong="H0120"\w* \w pride|strong="H1346"\w* shall bring him \w low|strong="H8213"\w*: but \w honour|strong="H3519"\w* shall \w uphold|strong="H8551"\w* the \w humble|strong="H8217"\w* in \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w*.

Whoso is \w partner|strong="H2505"\w* with a \w thief|strong="H1590"\w* \w hateth|strong="H8130"\w* his own \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*: he \w heareth|strong="H8085"\w* \w cursing|strong="H0423"\w*, and \w bewrayeth|strong="H5046"\w* \add it\add* not.

The \w fear|strong="H2731"\w* of \w man|strong="H0120"\w* \w bringeth|strong="H5414"\w* a \w snare|strong="H4170"\w*: but whoso putteth his \w trust|strong="H0982"\w* in the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* shall be \w safe|strong="H7682"\w*.\f + \fr 29.25 \ft safe: Heb. set on high\f*

\w Many|strong="H7227"\w* \w seek|strong="H1245"\w* the \w ruler’s|strong="H4910"\w* \w favour|strong="H6440"\w*; but \add every\add* \w man’s|strong="H0376"\w* \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w* \add cometh\add* from the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.\f + \fr 29.26 \ft the ruler’s…: Heb. the face of a ruler\f*

An \w unjust|strong="H5766"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \add is\add* an \w abomination|strong="H8441"\w* to the \w just|strong="H6662"\w*: and \add he that is\add* \w upright|strong="H3477"\w* in the \w way|strong="H1870"\w* \add is\add* \w abomination|strong="H8441"\w* to the \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w*.
